Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
03.07.2013 SH SCR18243 Button Cross off: Changed call of OPH411C to submit serverjob
23.01.2013 SH SCR17882 Added OPH411C.PI.TRANSFERDATE
10.05.2012 SH SCR17333 Added V.TRANSFERDATE
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
11.08.2011 GB SCR16651 Added zoomlist with HOFF_CODE of all HOFF rows
18.02.2010 GB SCR15343 Removed enabled condition for button Cross off
20.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Extended selection
23.10.2006 AK SCR11825 added button List transfer in 'SQL_OverviewBankTotalsCurr
12.10.2006 AK SCR11971added button Croos off in 'SQL_OverviewBankTotalsCurrency'
13.09.2006 AK SCR11825 added a call to prog 'OPH411 BankTotalsValuedatPrint'
12.09.2006 AK SCR11812 add 2 parameters when calling prog'OPH411B BankTransferA'
14.06.2006 JJ SCR11417 Added call to print program+ activation left print button
12.12.2005 SH SCR9328 Changed BANK_LEDG_NO_CHEQUES to
BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES
-- uses for filter on currency in task "SQL_OverviewBanksTotals"
-- selected BANK_CURRENCY in "SQL_OverviewBankTotalsCurrency",
uses for LOCATE if coming back form child task
-- Shortcut labels
-- Uses for combo box --> v.Currency
-- Shortcut handling
... set transfer date (alpha) for further selections

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BANK_CURRENCY, cast(sum(BANK_NEWBALANCE) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(BANK_CREDITLINE_OPEN) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK, :1/ADMU where BANK_ADMNO = ADMU_ADMNO and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = 'Y' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':2' :3 group by BANK_CURRENCY order by BANK_CURRENCY FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- uses for "SQL_OverviewBanksTotals" (could be changed in child task)
-- uses for LOCATE if coming back form child task
-- Info to user that job is submitted

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES), min(BANK_NAME), min(cast(BANK_NEWBALANCE as decimal(13,2))), cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)), min(cast(BANK_CREDITLINE_OPEN as decimal(13,2))) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/LGCD on LGCD_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_DATE > ':5' inner join :1/ADMU on BANK_ADMNO = ADMU_ADMNO and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = 'Y' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':3' where BANK_CURRENCY = ':2' :4 group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO order by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- If the users select an other currency (= filter currency) then the overview
has to be closed immed and has to be restarted

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BANK_CURRENCY FROM :1/bank GROUP BY BANK_CURRENCY ORDER BY BANK_CURRENCY FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.val: -- Not sure if nulls can be returned.. but better safe than
